tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
After the long wait of 8 years,God has blessed us a new year 2020 priceless gift in the form an angel through god mother Dr.Jeyarani Kamaraj.

you are the one we trust with our life.we are safe in your hands madam.

We are so happy when I gave birth to my first born at Aakash Fertility center, Vadapalani.

No words are enough to appreciate the service you do. You as a doctor and the staff at Aakash hospital has been really helpful and supportive. 

From the bottom of my heart,
Thank you madam (Dr.Jeyarani Kamaraj) for all your excellent medical service.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Less waiting time and nice ambience in waiting hall. Good explanation by doctor and consultation fee is lesser then others.

They do not respect the time others.
1) First time they asked to come at 3:30 PM, after multiple times asking the doorkeeper we went and met Mrs.Jeyarani at 9:30 PM.(She asked us to take multiple scans and blood test for Rs18K)
2) We came in 2 times for taking the Blood Test and scan in empty stomach, we were again asked to come next week , because Mrs. Jeyarani has to approve the scan and she is not there.
3) Now i am writing this review from the Hospital waiting room . Its already been 3 hours of wait.
â€” No tocken system for wait.
* *** ******* **** ** ****** *** **** ***** ******* ******* ** **** ******* ************ **** ** ***** **** **** **** ** **** ******** ***** **** *** ********* Please calculate 3 hours waiting time for lab
â€” 4 hours waiting time for scan
â€” atleast 4 hours for waiting time to meet Dr.Jeyarani
Overall, it will take 3 days and 4 visits to assess the problem and get an doctor opinion.

Please plan accordingly if you come here to meet the very very very very very very POOR time management.

Dr.Jeyarani says that she is alway busy with emergency, she dosent even know the basic etiquette pf time management, not sure how to take her suggestions and advice. ****** *** *** ******* **** ** **** ****** ** *** **** **** *** **** *** **** *** ***** *** ***** ****** * ****** ***** ** ****** *** **** ** **** **** ***** ****** ** ******* ****** **** ** **** ********** ***** *** ************ ******* * ***** ************* * **************** ** ***** *************** * ******** *** * ****** ** ***** *********** ** ***** ******* *** *********** ************* ******** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Child Birth Education,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Good treatment has been given. Any doubts and clarification to the staff members they r given the details in friendly manner and hospitalization interior is also good....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. K. S. Jeyarani was kind enough to explain patients about their issues. Doctor itself attending each and every individual cases which I like about them. Yesterday was my fibroid removal surgery, I had a mild comfort after the surgery. Now I am slowly recovering from that. I thank doctor for her service.

***** **** ************** kind and shares the positivity. 
Well equipped hospital with all facilities for Women. 
Easyily accessible from main roads and located at core places of city. 


Cons: unnecessary waiting time while registering op and meet duty doctors. One should spend whole day to get the consultation, which is hard and least possible for the people who are working.  ***** ***** *** *** ******* ******* **** *** **** *** *** ********** *** working people should inform leave priorly.

We are blessed with a baby girl "Angel" in July 2018. 

My Sincere and heartfelt  thanks to Dr.K S Jayarani Kamaraj madam, T Kamaraj Sir, Niveditha mam and all the duty doctors, nurses and all staff of Aakash Fertility Centre & Hospital,  for their wonderful, professional, ethical and excellent treatment and hospitality. May God give all the blessings and strength to treat more and more people like us. Excellent hospital for infertility treatments with an experience of 25 years and "all under one roof" with an intention "Yes! You can have a baby". Further this hospital is Exclusively for reproductive Medicine in India. 
Thankyou,
Shanker R Iyer & Subashini Shanker.

Dr advice are very help full and kind, i m happy to take treatment in this hospital and i will refer *** **** ******** ** ******* to take a treatment for fertility

review: The way they welcomed us ad courtus behaviour of their staffs made us felt very friendly.  The way doctors were confident about treating us is simply magnificent. They even bested confidence within us. Always grateful to them.
Doctor was helpful, but 3+ hrs wait time is too long for a consultation. Managing the appointment can be improved

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Actually I planned to consult Dr. Jeyarani kamaraj for period cramps. But there they take me to Dr. Niveditha kamaraj. She enquired all my medical history and explained the body condition very well. I never met any doctors like her. She make sure my comfortness, explained in a friendly manner and she is keen on not hurting the patients. Am very much impressed and stress-free now. Thank you so much mam.
Clearly explained about health issues and what to do next to improve health condition to avoid risk
We are very pleased to recommend Aakash fertility centre and team who helped us achieve a successful pregnancy when this seemed beyond hope.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
The doctor was very understanding and her explanation about the issue was very good! 
And the approach of the treatment plan was very satisfactory! 
Would definitely recommend the doctor. 
It was overall a very good experience.
Waited for 4 hours for 2 days in order to meet the doctor. Horrible experience. Wasted 5000 in tests **** **** *** ****** ** **** Would never recommend to anyone at all
before 22nd year doctor gave pregancy treatment.now me and my both childrens safe and happy, i know very well mrs. doctor.....
